data.text: Read all about it! 📚 The UN has launched a brand new book club on the #GlobalGoals! The aim is simple: to teach children all about building a sustainable world for the future. Don’t miss it 👉 https://t.co/q8KhNhJRpY #SDGBookClub https://t.co/mexkmmIefx

Ahead of Mine Awareness Day, see how @UNMAS explosive disposal experts have helped the people of Mosul, Iraq return to their homes to rebuild their lives after ISIS. https://t.co/8KO0evdFa5 #IMAD2019 https://t.co/VKsxntsDpZ

Humanity
Neutrality
Impartiality
Independence

These are the 4 principles guiding the UN's humanitarian work. More here: https://t.co/zhMibwYdQv https://t.co/1knae5JXjg

Follow @antonioguterres to Egypt to pay his respects at @AlAzhar & learns about archaeology at the Grand Egyptian Museum. All that & more in our latest @instagram story ➡️ https://t.co/UH4OQC7zhU https://t.co/Ae4meNZiUZ
72 million of the people facing acute food insecurity in 2018 came from just 8 countries. Details in @FAO's new #GlobalFoodCrises report: https://t.co/vH0wpM4mBE https://t.co/m94dAMjVfq

At the Grand Egyptian Museum in Cairo, @antonioguterres saw "an impressive reminder of how the Arab world opened the door to epic discoveries & possibilities." 

Here's how @UNESCO works to protect cultural heritage: https://t.co/IM6HIHBmDu https://t.co/JcBGUMYwRV
Benefits of leveraging technology to remove barriers & help those with autism fully participate in society stressed at Tuesday's #WorldAutismAwarenessDay event at UNHQ. https://t.co/zog9jCAcJq

“I want you to know that we stand with you. We are committed to supporting you in rebuilding your homes & your communities." -- @AminaJMohammed, expressing UN's commitment to helping those impacted by #CycloneIdai. https://t.co/IQrenfd4nL
https://t.co/V1zP9nBkof

"Instead of dwelling on our differences, let us focus on what unites us, and work together for a better future for everyone, everywhere." -- @antonioguterres at @AlAzhar in Cairo. https://t.co/GHgrVhJI9S https://t.co/1QRG6ou4Gn

Let us reaffirm our commitment to promoting the full participation of all people with autism, by ensuring they have the necessary tools to exercise their rights & fundamental freedoms.
-- @antonioguterres on Tuesday's #WorldAutismAwarenessDay https://t.co/Og0eDUzQ8Q https://t.co/SvQ6bma3t1

.@antonioguterres calls for investments in mediation & prevention to address conflicts in the Arab world and says what's needed is:

– development
– respect for human rights
– democratic institutions https://t.co/hncwFVrzai

“Globalism is irreversible and we all live in a global world."
Speaking with young people in Tunisia on Monday, @antonioguterres stressed need for countries to cooperate on #ClimateAction & #GlobalGoals to make globalism work for all. https://t.co/0uM2LM8RES https://t.co/mRLG2BbGCG
In our latest @instagram story, @antonioguterres exchanges ideas & views with young people in Tunisia & honours terror victims at @BardoMusee. https://t.co/UH4OQBPYqm https://t.co/07FyR3ci9i

At last week's @unpeacekeeping ministerial, countries pledged their support for peace operations around the world. See if your country made a pledge in this @Twitter Moment. https://t.co/pZVpjPX2ab #A4P
People with autism have the equal right to make their own decisions & choices like everybody else. Get the facts on Tuesday's #WorldAutismAwarenessDay: https://t.co/fbSCMOh5XY https://t.co/OlJ7AbgKdB

Ensuring women & girls can take their own decisions on education, marriage & reproduction is a focus of annual #CPD52 session, which opened Monday: https://t.co/6IY1KGnLOo #GlobalGoals https://t.co/IemL90Fj0A

"My thoughts are always with all the victims, their families and with the Tunisian people. With my deep condolences and all my solidarity." -- @antonioguterres in guest book at Tunisia's @BardoMusee, site of 2015 terror attack. https://t.co/agrsLLn548
Record sea level rise, increasing land & ocean temperatures all confirm urgent need for #ClimateAction, according to new @WMO #StateofClimate report: https://t.co/IHgqIjIqoA https://t.co/pKSWEBmCkN

"Diversity is the key for peace in the modern world."

In Tunisia, @antonioguterres met with university students to exchange views & hear their concerns. Watch what happened here: https://t.co/UaZ6BWGZgl #GlobalGoals https://t.co/jU7CqYbvaa
Concludes this week @UNGeneva: Committee on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities 21st session. Info & documents here ➡️ https://t.co/fpXi4hgwha https://t.co/pSCNtsUAR1
Starts on Monday in Copenhagen: Climate & #GlobalGoals Synergy Conference for inclusive #ClimateAction 👉 https://t.co/zlEZrU5Mix https://t.co/ACzMpzS9A5
What's happening this week at the UN? Commission on Population and Development #CPD52, World Autism Awareness Day & much more: https://t.co/GjD7KU578C https://t.co/EhVix4L6TK

Monday: As April gets underway, France & Germany continue with first-ever joint presidencies of the Security Council, aligning their programmes of work. Follow @GermanyUN and @franceonu for updates: https://t.co/NNsOYhXDe2 https://t.co/KoMKsRuwHU
In Tunisia on Sunday, @antonioguterres took part in #ArabSummit2019, inaugurated new UN offices, met with civil society reps & more. https://t.co/Q3xCzQtH9N https://t.co/GuPReYe4zK

The 2019 #SDGFilmFest seeks YOUR short film about:
🌍Protecting our planet
🤝 Reducing inequalities
☮️ Building peace
👩🏾‍🏭Ensuring quality education and jobs
Enter here by 26 April: https://t.co/ae6BK2v6kD https://t.co/Z0ZAEX3eaK
The last 4 years have been the warmest on record, @WMO warns, calling for urgent #ClimateAction in new #StateofClimate report. https://t.co/IHgqIjIqoA https://t.co/8jRbd2fXK6

"Let us work ever closer together to unleash the full potential of this vital region, respond to the aspirations of youth and build a better future for all." -- @antonioguterres tells #ArabSummit2019. https://t.co/1NjoZcZClh https://t.co/AxTKYxI0ZC
On Sunday's  #TransVisibilityDay, join @free_equal to support fair treatment of lesbian, gay, bi, trans & intersex people: https://t.co/rYKhkVlJmN #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/6MLN2kuze3

“Genocide is a process. The Holocaust did not start with the gas chambers. It started with hate speech.”
-- @UN_GP_RtoP's Adama Dieng on how to #PreventGenocide https://t.co/vgA88LUVk9

The affects of climate change are already being witnessed in many regions of Africa. See how @unenvironment is working to strengthen climate change adaptation in one of the most vulnerable parts of the world. https://t.co/fg96FS2Y3G #ClimateAction
Lights out! UNHQ in NYC went dark for Saturday's #EarthHour. Here's how you can take #ClimateAction all year round: https://t.co/ZA3k0bd75T #GlobalGoals https://t.co/E9E6oRQeeY
On Saturday, @antonioguterres arrived in Tunis, to attend the #ArabSummit2019 & more. Follow along on his trip in our @Instagram story: https://t.co/UH4OQBPYqm https://t.co/FBO0YYaNKF

For trans people around the world, living openly can be difficult, or even dangerous. UN @free_equal works for a world that values & welcomes all people: https://t.co/rYKhkVlJmN #TransVisibilityDay https://t.co/xwLcS0epW7

On Friday, @Refugees Special Envoy Angelina Jolie came to UNHQ where she stressed her support for @UNPeacekeeping & int'l cooperation to reduce the risk of conflict. https://t.co/YFJLyw1lGJ #A4P https://t.co/QCHCynECro

From tackling unemployment to inequality to environmental pollution - see how @ILO is helping companies adapt their business practices for the benefit of people & planet. https://t.co/SxwoX2jcgs #ILO100

"Everyone who's in a position to help should find something to do so that the memory of those who died lives on." 

Survivors of the genocide against the Tutsi in Rwanda speak out to help #PreventGenocide in the future. #Kwibuka25 https://t.co/GGKoZHRd3n
Check out our latest @instagram story & see how @antonioguterres & others honoured those #ServingForPeace with @unpeacekeeping on Friday. https://t.co/UH4OQC7zhU https://t.co/dOfi9eIqvZ
Taking #ClimateAction could be as simple as making a few small changes to your daily shower routine. Here's how ⬇️ https://t.co/RSjPyslQTY

"We cannot stand by while the humanitarian situation deteriorates, development gaps increase & security risks become unsustainable." -- @antonioguterres at Security Council meeting on situation in Mali. https://t.co/AoeDVpHNKR https://t.co/4LKfojyRqk

"UN missions often represent the last and only hope for millions of people facing daily threats to their safety and their basic rights." @refugees Special Envoy Angelina Jolie at Friday's @UNPeacekeeping ministerial at UNHQ. https://t.co/YFJLyw1lGJ https://t.co/qxqdeVZzx8

On Friday, @antonioguterres honoured Lt Commander Braga with Military Gender Advocate of the Year award. She's a Brazilian peacekeeper #ServingForPeace with @UN_CAR. https://t.co/YFJLyw1lGJ https://t.co/MZrnR1VSZz
From shelter to food to health care - see how @Refugees is helping the 25 million refugees worldwide. ⬇️ https://t.co/OytWQaqMuk #WithRefugees https://t.co/YSs9dw6h0J
Some of the faces of the 270K+ people  affected by #CycloneIdai in Zimbabwe. See how @WFP is working to help these & other survivors: https://t.co/GnNBHb4Se3 https://t.co/GQPpcZR0wD
Check out our latest @instagram story and see how young people, @antonioguterres, @UN_PGA & others came together Thursday to push for #ClimateAction. https://t.co/UH4OQC7zhU https://t.co/oiaejfNwqr

New @WMO #StateofClimate report highlights record sea level rise & exceptionally high temperatures as physical signs & socio-economic impacts of climate change are accelerating. https://t.co/IHgqIjIqoA #ClimateAction https://t.co/2zejdaViGL

"No matter where you are born, how marginalized your community is – the world is determined to carry everyone along in our journey to 2030. " -- @AminaJMohammed on the #GlobalGoals at Wednesday's Asia-Pacific Forum opening: https://t.co/skTYWMJH6K https://t.co/hMDxLllOj3

"Global climate marches are sending a clear message. Young people are demanding that today’s leaders act on behalf of future generations. I echo that demand." -- @antonioguterres joins young people in calling for #ClimateAction. https://t.co/Nnudijeqx6 https://t.co/qo8zDnN9t6

UN Peacekeepers from Malaysia serve at great personal risk & under harsh conditions to help others. We thank them for their service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ  #ServingForPeace https://t.co/1xYEP4WHse
Security Council adopts milestone resolution Thursday aimed at shutting down funding sources for terrorist groups. https://t.co/AM0209sKjv
Mali: @UN_GP_RtoP's Adama Dieng warns of high risk that further escalation of tensions could result in atrocity crimes, following recent killings of 130+ people. https://t.co/ujFwJ3CjfG

35+ M people affected by floods
1600+ deaths associated with heatwaves & wildfires
2M+ people displaced by climate-related disasters

New @WMO #StateofClimate report highlights urgent need for #ClimateAction to protect people & planet. https://t.co/IHgqIjIqoA https://t.co/R8d984Qqoj

Meet Lieutenant Commander Braga - a Brazilian peacekeeper #ServingForPeace with @UN_CAR. On Friday, she will be honored with the 2018 UN Military Gender Advocate of the Year Award. 

https://t.co/3ziGLnJbrA

Starting soon: high-level #UNGA meeting on #ClimateAction and #GlobalGoals with @antonioguterres, @UN_PGA & more. Watch live:
https://t.co/jPhHh9iTqL

#CycloneIdai has affected thousands of pregnant women & new mothers in Mozambique, Zimbabwe and Malawi. In the aftermath of the catastrophic storm, @unfpa is restoring hope & new life: https://t.co/xl6zu5hhsH https://t.co/qSXIxxAVyO

Yemen: 2 years since world's largest cholera outbreak, @WHO & @UNICEF to scale up efforts following sharp increase of reported cases, deaths from disease. https://t.co/eo2XD0N5e6 https://t.co/Gp4ULf2rWQ

Action for Peacekeeping: see updates on @antonioguterres' plan to refocus @unpeacekeeping through targeted mandates, better-equipped & trained forces & more effective operations: https://t.co/qy3UiSZKHA #A4P https://t.co/CJXdwxH748
It takes 2,000 gallons of water 💧 to make 1 pair of jeans 👖. Find out more about the environmental impact of the fashion industry and what you can do about it. https://t.co/e5C5sS0APU #ClimateAction

"No matter where you are born, how marginalized your community is – the world is determined to carry everyone along in our journey to 2030. " -- @AminaJMohammed on the #GlobalGoals at Wednesday's Asia-Pacific Forum opening: https://t.co/skTYWMJH6K

The devastation caused by #CycloneIdai is stark evidence that the countries which contribute least to climate change are the ones being affected by it the most -- Mami Mizutori, @HeadUNISDR  https://t.co/nCYOvySAfz #ClimateAction

Female deminers are on the front-lines of efforts to make South Sudan safer & free of land mines, while challenging gender stereotypes. More on @UNMAS' work: https://t.co/G1QnsRPGWU https://t.co/NwwkNqoZ98
Have a look at our latest @instagram story to meet military & police officers from Malaysia #ServingForPeace with @UNPeacekeeping: https://t.co/UH4OQC7zhU https://t.co/mndiUcLQu5
Cameroon: 430,000+ people are currently displaced by violence, mainly women & children; @Refugees says $184M needed as humanitarian situation worsens. https://t.co/PSszCupeCm #WithRefugees

A new #RememberSlavery exhibit at UNHQ explores the dark saga of the transatlantic slave trade & how it impacted NYC in the 17th & 18th centuries. Details: https://t.co/dnXmMRX8aK https://t.co/uwWyehqntE

Events like #CycloneIdai are becoming more frequent, more severe & devastating and more widespread, and this will only get worse if we do not act now. -- @antonioguterres on the need for urgent #ClimateAction. https://t.co/pUnCHTH00f https://t.co/ZgYyKn0LqT

"This peace award gives us strength & hope for safety & dignity for women, as well as for our country," -- Dr. Cynthia, one of the brave heroes working in support of refugees & a @UNDP N-Peace award winner: https://t.co/YvAAVTsszj https://t.co/wv3DAbISOx

"I am concerned that we may once again be facing another dangerous escalation of violence in Gaza with potentially catastrophic consequences.” -- UN's @nmladenov as Security Council meets amid rising tensions in Middle East. https://t.co/CQpalvWiQg https://t.co/FbcwmP2xGe

What would you do with 4 minutes of extra time?
In just 4 minutes @WFP can: 
🍞 buy food worth 30,000 USD
🚚 deliver 81,000kg of food
🍲 provide school meals for 600 children
See how you too can help achieve #ZeroHunger: https://t.co/HtVipKp3dv https://t.co/Us7lZJk0lN

"The people of Mozambique, Zimbabwe and Malawi will need strong, sustained support. 

Let that solidarity start with a generous response to the appeals." 
-@antonioguterres calls for urgent funding for life-saving aid in wake of 
#CycloneIdai. https://t.co/8DODlaoWhr
New @ITCnews #SheTrades web and mobile app is one-stop-shop online platform for women entrepreneurs, buyers, investors & more: https://t.co/GrteFEic4g  #GlobalGoals https://t.co/jFGA30lkQ5

UN Peacekeepers from Malaysia leave their families behind & travel to some of the most hostile environments on the planet to protect the most vulnerable. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ  #ServingForPeace https://t.co/nUCR6oP5Bb

.@IntlCrimCourt Prosecutor Fatou Bensouda expresses grave concern following recent violence in central Mali, including reported massacre that killed 130+ civilians, including women & children. https://t.co/y7O40NoKYN
Since 2013, @UN_MINUSMA has worked in Mali to protect civilians, support security measures, promote human rights & more: https://t.co/0RCUOXvuh6 #ServingForPeace https://t.co/zFPM1cRFKb

When #CycloneIdai hit Mozambique, Josias & his family huddled in a tree for 3 days without food or water. Read their incredible story of survival & how @UNICEF is helping their recovery. https://t.co/VNtkauW6yq https://t.co/uYF5E0y9Nu

"We must work harder to repair the fissures and polarization that are so prevalent in our societies today." -- @antonioguterres at Monday's #FightRacism event. https://t.co/uR6s419CD4 https://t.co/ExANjHYAIw

"UN personnel work unwaveringly to help the most vulnerable, protect the planet & build a better future for all. Sadly, fulfilling this vital mission often entails great perils." -- @antonioguterres on int'l day of solidarity: https://t.co/V7paFj5J46 https://t.co/1MjOceOVaY

As @WFP satellite imagery indicates up to 1.7M people were in its path, the devastation wreaked by #CycloneIdai appears larger than anyone thought, making it one of the worst climate-related disasters to hit Southern Africa. https://t.co/nmUiiqwsJd

The "Ark of Return" at UNHQ honours the victims of slavery & highlights the legacy of the slave trade.

160+ countries agreed this week in Argentina on better ways for Global South countries to work together for the #globalgoals. https://t.co/GMYusu9cqV

News this week: #CSW63 delivers roadmap on ensuring women’s social protection, mobility, safety, access to economic opportunities and sustainable infrastructure as key to achieving the #GlobalGoals.  

@UN_Women explains how here. https://t.co/Nj6Reqv1ma
On Sunday's Int'l Day for the right to truth about human rights abuses, we pay tribute to those who have devoted their lives to #StandUp4HumanRights: https://t.co/ybGA2MmPff https://t.co/QS9N2urtrJ

Inspired by the 🇳🇿 Kiwi hearts and hakas that have lifted the spirits of a grieving world, @AntonioGuterres calls on all to act against extremism in all its forms. https://t.co/a325QgvqE3 https://t.co/cNK2Rri90i
Tuberculosis is the top infectious disease killer in the world. On Sunday's #WorldTBDay & every day, let's unite to #EndTB! https://t.co/NfQOZXfgYI https://t.co/AnZQHgx52G

"I'd seen the pictures...but I’d assumed the camera had sought out the extremes. I didn’t realize how easy it is to find such severe cases." - @WFP’s @A_Symington shares her 1st-hand account of Yemen's struggle to save a generation from malnutrition. https://t.co/M8JialA5w7
Upcoming #HumanDevelopmentReport to provide comprehensive picture of how inequality is shaping our world. Preview here: https://t.co/bgVpKdFhxr #GlobalGoals https://t.co/4U78a0CRp1

Our latest @Instagram story takes you behind the scenes with @antonioguterres as he shows solidarity with people at the NYC Islamic Cultural Center, following last week's terror attacks in New Zealand: https://t.co/UH4OQC7zhU https://t.co/AuHx6H4Zy4

"I know these are trying times, but I am here to say, with a heart that is heavy but full, that you are not alone, that the world is with you. The United Nations is with you. And I am with you." 
-@antonioguterres visiting NYC Islamic Cultural Center: https://t.co/PFgW1oJKRd https://t.co/aJnqKi2N5R
